login-error: There was a problem with your login.
email-login-error: Something went wrong while sending the email. Please try again later.
email-login-success: A sign in link has been sent to your email address. The link will expire in 24 hours.
sign-up-message: Signing up signifies that you have read and agree to the Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.
team-invite: is inviting you to join their team.
invite-member-message: Invite new member by email to join your organization.
remove-team-warning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the team and associated members access.
leave-team-success: You have left the team successfully.
allow-team: Allow team members to login using an Identity Provider.
members-of-a-team: Members of a team have access to specific areas, such as a new release or a new application feature.
accept-invite: You can accept the invitation to join the team by clicking the button below.
invite-create-account: To continue, you must either create a new account or login to an existing account.
no-active-team: You do not have any active team.
audit-logs: Audit Logs allow you to track and analyze each member activity.
